excerpt: Pasta & risotto, plus fish & vegan dishes, in a cozy restaurant with a sprawling summer garden.
detail_description: La Paloma is a charming restaurant located near the village of San Lorenzo in Ibiza. The cozy establishment features a sprawling summer garden with glowing citrus trees, candlelit tables, and vintage furniture, creating a romantic Mediterranean atmosphere. The menu offers homemade traditional dishes from Tuscany made with organically sourced ingredients from their own vegetable garden and local suppliers on the island.
name: La Paloma
address: Carrer Can Pou, 4, 07812 Sant Llorenc de Balafia, Illes Balears, Spain

excerpt: Locally sourced dishes, ice cream & cocktails offered in a chill beachfront locale.
detail_description: El Chiringuito Ibiza is a beach club located on the chic Es Cavallet beach, offering locally sourced dishes, ice cream, and cocktails in a relaxed beachfront setting. The venue boasts a sunny terrace with stunning views over Dalt Vila, Ibiza's old town. Their breakfast menu features classic brunch options as well as traditional Spanish breakfast items.
name: El Chiringuito Ibiza
address: Camí des Cavallet, 07818, Balearic Islands, Spain

excerpt: Classic tapas & signature cocktails at a buzzy spot with stone walls & exposed, painted wood beams.
detail_description: La Bodega Eivissa is a popular spot located at the bottom of the rampart leading to Dalt Vila in Ibiza Town. The restaurant's charming exterior with hanging baskets and authentic interior make it a favorite among locals and tourists alike. Known for its high-quality tapas menu, including authentic albondigas and chorizo, this Mediterranean restaurant offers friendly service from 6pm till late.
name: La Bodega Eivissa
address: Carrer Bisbe Torres Mayans, 2, 07800 Ibiza, Balearic Islands, Spain

excerpt: Cocktails, seafood & grilled meat highlighted in a loungey beachfront spot with movie nights.
detail_description: Amante Ibiza is a beach club and restaurant located in a picturesque setting overlooking Sol den Serra bay. During the day, guests can relax on luxury daybeds with waiter service while enjoying Mediterranean cuisine and cocktails. The venue also offers yoga sessions followed by healthy buffet breakfasts in the mornings. In the evening, it transforms into a fine dining restaurant serving modern Mediterranean dishes, making it an ideal spot for a romantic dinner.
name: Amante Ibiza
address: Cala Sol d'en Serra Calle Afueras, s/n, 07849 Cala Llonga, Balearic Islands, Spain

excerpt: Mediterranean-inspired cuisine, including seafood & paella, at beachside tables & sun loungers.
detail_description: Es Torrent is a renowned seafood restaurant located on the southern coast of Ibiza, directly on the beach. It offers Mediterranean-inspired cuisine with a focus on fresh seafood and traditional Balearic dishes. The restaurant has a charming rustic setting where diners can enjoy their meal while listening to the gentle waves. In addition to its delectable paella, Es Torrent also offers simply grilled squid and red Ibizan prawns.
name: Es Torrent
address: Playa Es Torrent, s/n, 07830 Sant Josep de sa Talaia, Balearic Islands, Spain

excerpt: Rustic-chic beachfront restaurant & terrace for chargrilled meat & seafood platters, plus paella.
detail_description: Restaurante Cala Bonita is a rustic-chic beachfront dining spot known for its chargrilled meat, seafood platters, and delectable paella. Located on the beautifully preserved sandy beach of Cala Llentrisca near Ibiza town, this exclusive restaurant offers a unique and romantic dining experience. Accessible only by boat, it promises stunning views of the crystal-clear waters and innovative Spanish cuisine made with the freshest local produce.
name: Restaurante Cala Bonita
address: Playa de s'Estanyol, s/n, 07819, Balearic Islands, Spain

detail_description: Can Terra Ibiza is a popular restaurant in Ibiza town, known for its delicious Pintxos, which are small Basque tapas served on white bread. The restaurant is located near Vara de Rey square and is a favorite among locals and tourists. It's recommended to arrive early or be patient due to its popularity. The restaurant offers a great atmosphere with divine pintxos and minimal fluorescent lighting, making it an ideal place to enjoy Spanish dishes away from the hustle of tourist crowds.
name: Can Terra Ibiza
address: Avinguda d'Ignasi Wallis, 14, 07800 Ibiza, Balearic Islands, Spain

excerpt: Airy, industrial-style osteria offering contemporary Mediterranean cuisine plus a daily set menu.
detail_description: Located just a stone's throw away from the heart of Ibiza Town, Locals Only Eivissa is an airy osteria with an industrial-style vibe that offers contemporary Mediterranean cuisine and a daily set menu. The restaurant takes pride in its broad selection of dishes made from locally sourced organic produce, including fish, seafood, fruits, and vegetables.
name: Locals Only Eivissa
address: plaza del parque, 5, 07800 Eivissa, Illes Balears, Spain

detail_description: Nestled in the charming village of Santa Gertrudis, Wild Beets stands as a beacon for health enthusiasts visiting Ibiza. This vibrant eatery specializes in plant-based cuisine, offering an array of vegan, raw, gluten-free, and dairy-free breakfast delights served from 8 AM until noon. Guests can indulge in mouthwatering dishes like their signature acai bowl topped with homemade granola and fresh fruits or savor the unique raw walnut banana pancakes drizzled with maple syrup.
name: Wild Beets
address: Carrer Venda de Can Llàtzer, 9, 07814 Santa Gertrudis de Fruitera, Balearic Islands, Spain

detail_description: Nestled within the luxurious Ibiza Gran Hotel, La Gaia by Óscar Molina is a culinary gem that captivates with its stunning decor and innovative cuisine. This chic restaurant boasts walls adorned with striking photographs, setting the stage for an unforgettable dining experience. Guests can indulge in either a 10-course or 14-course tasting menu that artfully combines local flavors with international influences, particularly drawing inspiration from Japan and Peru.
name: La Gaia | Ibiza Gran Hotel
address: Passeig Joan Carles I, 17, 07800 Ibiza, Balearic Islands, Spain

detail_description: Nestled within the stunning confines of an ancient monastery chapel, Sa Capella offers a dining experience that feels like a journey back in time, far removed from the bustling resort scene of San Antonio. The interior boasts grand high arches and exposed stonework, creating an atmosphere of elegance complemented by large metal candelabras. For those who prefer al fresco dining, the charming terrace adorned with bougainvillea and candle-lit tables provides a rustic yet romantic setting.
name: Sa Capella
address: Carrer Capella, 26, 07820 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Balearic Islands, Spain

detail_description: Chambao By the Beach is a chiringuito-style restaurant located at Nobu Ibiza Bay Hotel, offering a relaxed and laid-back beach atmosphere. The restaurant serves authentic homemade paellas, freshly caught fish, locally sourced salads, and organic dishes. Guests can enjoy breakfast and lunch with their feet in the sand while taking in the beautiful beach scenery. Chambao provides outdoor seating for soaking up the sun or indoor tables for those seeking shade.
name: Chambao By the Beach
address: Camí ses Feixes, 52, 07800 Eivissa, Illes Balears, Spain

detail_description: The Skinny Kitchen is a popular spot for health-conscious travelers, especially those looking to recover from late nights of partying. Located on the harbor front, this health cafe offers a variety of fitness-inspired foods including low-calorie burgers, protein bowls, and vegan and vegetarian meals. The restaurant also serves a vibrant selection of juices and smoothies packed with essential vitamins. The concept behind The Skinny Kitchen is to provide healthier options without leaving diners feeling over-stuffed.
name: The Skinny Kitchen
address: Passeig ses Pitiüses, 16, 07800 Eivissa, Illes Balears, Spain

detail_description: Laylah is a new addition to Ibiza's dining scene, offering a unique blend of food, music, and ambiance. Located near the Talamancas beach, this restaurant boasts a menu featuring grilled artichokes with parmesan, crispy spiced chicken cigars, endives with herb tabbouleh and roasted pecans, and silky tuna tartare. The establishment is the brainchild of Olivia Fleury and Oren Heknin and stands out for its exciting cocktail selection.
name: Laylah
address: Av. 8 d'Agost, 29, 07800 Ibiza, Balearic Islands, Spain

detail_description: Cas Pagès is a traditional Spanish steakhouse located near the Las Dalias hippie market, popular among locals but less known to tourists. The restaurant doesn't accept advance bookings and only takes cash payments. Despite its unassuming exterior, the interior offers a warm atmosphere with visible grills and trees. The food is highly recommended, with generous portions at affordable prices. It's considered one of the best places for an authentic local dining experience on Ibiza.
name: Cas Pagès
address: Ctra. San Carlos, km 10, 07840 Santa Eulària des Riu, Illes Balears, Spain

detail_description: CHIDas bar + cantina is a vibrant and affordable restaurant located in one of Ibiza's bustling squares. What started as a small cantina has now expanded into a full-scale dining establishment, adored by locals for its no-fuss yet delicious Mexican cuisine. The menu features delectable tacos, burritos, and an array of agave spirits like tequila and mezcal. The atmosphere is casual and lively, with great food, drinks, and music creating an inviting setting.
name: CHIDas bar + cantina
address: Plaza pintor Vicente calbet reira, n 3, 07800 Eivissa, Illes Balears, Spain

excerpt: Creative cocktails & globally influenced fare from sushi to pasta at a beach club with big-name DJs.
detail_description: Blue Marlin Eivissa is a glamorous beach club located in the breathtaking Cala Jondal bay. It's a popular spot known for its creative cocktails, globally influenced cuisine ranging from sushi to pasta, and big-name DJs spinning techno and house music late into the night. The club offers exclusive services such as a water-taxi to transport guests from luxury yachts to the shore.
name: Blue Marlin Eivissa
address: Cala Jondal, s/n, 07800 Ibiza, Balearic Islands, Spain

detail_description: Croissant Show is a legendary breakfast spot located in the old market square at the foot of the ramp to the Dalt Vila in Ibiza. The cafe, open from dawn until late at night during summer, is famous for its French patisserie-style croissants and pastries.
name: Croissant Show
address: Plaça de la Constitució, 2, 07800 Ibiza, Balearic Islands, Spain

detail_description: Aubergine Ibiza, located between Santa Gertrudis and San Miguel, has quickly become a popular spot since its opening last spring. The restaurant's charming and spacious interior features a farm-to-table menu with ingredients sourced from the surrounding vegetable gardens. In addition to organic dining, visitors can also explore the World Family Ibiza shop on-site.
name: Aubergine Ibiza
address: Carr. de San Miquel, km 9, 9, 07815 Sant Miquel de Balansat, Balearic Islands, Spain

detail_description: Nikki Beach Ibiza is a sought-after beach club known for its high-energy, luxurious atmosphere and glamorous events. Located on a beautiful beach in Santa Eulalia de Ibiza, it offers stunning views and an elegant setting for dining. The venue features a fantastic pool, white beds, and blue towels that create a chic ambiance. Guests can enjoy healthy salads, sushi, fresh seafood, and slow-roasted free-range chicken while taking in the splendid beach vistas.
name: Nikki Beach Ibiza
address: Avinguda de s'Argamassa, 153, 07840 S'Argamassa, Balearic Islands, Spain

excerpt: Cocktails, sushi & fusion dishes on a chic, pure-white terrace with DJ music, overlooking the sea.
detail_description: Cotton Beach Club Ibiza is a chic and trendy beach club located on the Playa de Cala Nova, offering a seamless blend of high-end beach club atmosphere and healthy organic cuisine. During the day, guests can relax on plush sun loungers and enjoy wholesome fare while soaking up the sun. As evening approaches, the vibe transforms into a sophisticated beachfront restaurant with white linen tablecloths, perfect for sipping innovative cocktails and indulging in Asian-inspired dishes.
name: Cotton Beach Club Ibiza
address: Carrer Posta de Sol, C/ de Cala Tarida, 21, 07829, Illes Balears, Spain

detail_description: Restaurante Es Caliu is a traditional Ibicenco restaurant with a charming farmhouse ambiance. The exterior features a windmill connected to an ancient waterwheel, while inside, the rustic interior showcases an open kitchen where chefs prepare delicious barbecue dishes. Visitors praise the flavorful and reasonably priced food, especially the well-tended vegetables and perfectly cooked meats. The attentive service adds to the excellent dining experience, making it a must-visit spot on the island for those seeking quality dishes in a welcoming atmosphere.
name: Es Caliu Ibiza
address: Carretera San Joan 10, 8, 07840 Santa Eulalia del Río, Balearic Islands, Spain

detail_description: Located on the way to Santa Gertrudis in Ibiza, Restaurant Can Caus is a classic Spanish eatery offering juicy grilled meats and traditional Spanish dishes. The rustic setting includes a spacious and cozy terrace where locals often gather. Additionally, the restaurant features a shop selling homemade cheeses, sausages, olive oil, and wine. Guests can enjoy cooking their own delicious meat on the BBQ while receiving excellent service from friendly staff.
name: RESTAURANT CAN CAUS
address: CARRETERA STA. MIGUEL, Km. 3,5, 07814 Santa Gertrudis de Fruitera, Illes Balears, Spain

detail_description: La Escollera is a Mediterranean restaurant in Ibiza with stunning views of the ocean. It's popular with locals and has delicious food and drinks. The staff are friendly and welcoming, and the setting is tranquil and serene.
name: La Escollera
address: Playa Es Cavallet, 07817 Sant Jordi de ses Salines, Illes Balears, Spain

excerpt: Champagne, cocktails & global food at an upscale harborside club with live cabaret shows & DJs.
detail_description: Lío is an upscale harborside club in Marina Botafoch, offering a luxurious experience with champagne, cocktails, and global cuisine. The venue hosts live cabaret shows featuring talented singers, dancers, contortionists, and acrobats performing around your table while you indulge in five-star dining. Situated high above the ground with stunning views of Ibiza town in the distance, Lío provides a captivating atmosphere for its VIP clientele.
name: Lío
address: Passeig Joan Carles I, 1, 07800 Eivissa, Illes Balears, Spain

excerpt: Lively seaside venue with cocktails, bar food & a DJ, known for sunset views from outdoor tables.
detail_description: Kumharas is a vibrant beachside venue that perfectly captures the essence of Ibiza's laid-back spirit. This charming spot, often described as a hippy haven, offers an incredible view of the sunset from its outdoor tables, making it an ideal place to unwind after a day in the sun. While not strictly a restaurant, Kumharas features a delightful street food court serving up international flavors that are freshly prepared and reasonably priced.
name: Kumharas
address: Carrer de Lugo, 2, 07829 Sant Josep de sa Talaia, Balearic Islands, Spain

name: Es Pins
address: Carretera C-733, Km 14,800, 07812, 07812 Sant Llorenc de Balafia, Balearic Islands, Spain

excerpt: Upmarket, carefully sourced Mediterranean plates served in a rustic-chic space with a wine cellar.
detail_description: Il Buco is a small but charming Italian restaurant in Santa Gertrudis, serving home-style cooking that aspire to nothing more than to satisfy. The menu is simple, with recipes emphasizing fresh ingredients and quality flavors. The service is attentive and friendly, and the atmosphere chic and comfortable.
name: Bottega il Buco
address: Carrer Vénda de Parada, 12, 07814 Santa Gertrudis de Fruitera, Balearic Islands, Spain

excerpt: Clams, squid, paella & grilled fish platters on a relaxed beachfront terrace with sunset views.
detail_description: Restaurant s'Illa des Bosc is a hidden gem nestled in the stunning Cala Conta, offering an unforgettable dining experience with breathtaking views of the sea and Isla des Bosc. This charming eatery specializes in Mediterranean and Ibizan cuisine, featuring a delightful array of fresh seafood, traditional Spanish paella, and high-quality local ingredients. The relaxed beachfront terrace provides the perfect setting to savor your meal while watching the sun dip below the horizon—an absolute must for anyone visiting Ibiza.
name: Restaurant s'Illa des Bosc
address: Diseminado S'illa des Bosc, 755, 07829 Sant Josep de sa Talaia, Balearic Islands, Spain

detail_description: Jondal is a renowned restaurant located on the San Jose beach of Cala Jondal in Ibiza. It opened in 2020 and quickly gained popularity due to its carefully curated ambiance and exquisite cuisine led by chef Rafael Zafra. The restaurant offers a unique dining experience with low chairs, jute rugs, and burlap sails set up under Ibiza's iconic sabina trees. Diners can enjoy their meal with their feet in the sand while gazing at the sea.
name: Jondal
address: Cala Jondal, s/n, 07839, Balearic Islands, Spain

excerpt: Grilled fish, paella & a long wine list at a family-run restaurant amid pine trees, plus sea views.
detail_description: Ses Boques is a family-run restaurant nestled in the heart of Ibiza's countryside, offering an authentic Ibizan dining experience. The charming agriturismo restaurant, located in a beautifully restored farmhouse, specializes in fresh seafood, vibrant paellas, and locally sourced ingredients. With its sea views and serene atmosphere near Es Cubells beach, it's an ideal spot for savoring traditional Ibizan cuisine.
name: Ses Boques
address: Playa de Ses boques, 07839 Sant Josep de sa Talaia, Illes Balears, Spain

detail_description: Nestled in the picturesque village of Sant Llorenc de Balafia, La Paloma is a popular dining spot that attracts a diverse clientele, including locals, artists, and new villa owners. The restaurant offers a charming ambience with its garden setting amidst citrus trees and vintage decor. The menu showcases Mediterranean cuisine crafted from locally sourced ingredients by the skilled chef Prasuna. Guests can savor fresh and healthy dishes with Mediterranean and Asian influences, perfect for sharing in generous portions.
name: La Paloma
address: Avda Pedro Matutes Noguera s/n, Platja d'en Bossa, 07800 Ibiza, Balearic Islands, Spain

excerpt: Laid-back eatery with a spacious heated terrace, providing local cuisine & an extensive wine list.
name: Es Mercat
address: Carrer de Sant Cristòfol, 16, 07800 Ibiza, Balearic Islands, Spain

excerpt: Inventive Mediterranean cuisine, with a seafood focus, on a chic terrace overlooking the bay.
detail_description: Sa Punta is a chic restaurant located in the Talamanca bay, just a short distance from bustling Ibiza town. The restaurant offers inventive Mediterranean cuisine with a focus on seafood, served on a stylish terrace overlooking the bay. The decor is inspired by East Asian elements, featuring orchid-inspired hanging lanterns and bursts of Balinese color. Sa Punta also includes Ginger, an Asian-fusion eatery with delectable dishes like Vietnamese spring rolls and zingy dumplings.
name: Sa Punta
address: Es Pouet de Talamanca, s/n, 07819 Eivissa, Illes Balears, Spain

excerpt: Cozy Mediterranean eatery featuring grilled meats & paella, plus a plant-filled terrace.
detail_description: Nestled in the romantic old quarter of Ibiza Town, La Brasa d'Eivissa is a cozy Mediterranean eatery known for its grilled meats, paella, and charming plant-filled terrace. The restaurant offers a refined menu featuring traditional Mediterranean dishes served simplistically. Set in a beautiful garden with classic white-linen tablecloths, this hidden gem attracts visitors from all over the island.
name: La Brasa d'Eivissa
address: Carrer de Pere Sala, 3, 07800 Eivissa, Illes Balears, Spain

detail_description: Los Pasajeros is a trendy and popular restaurant known for its lively atmosphere and generous portions of hearty food. The place is small, often crowded with locals and tourists who enjoy the energetic vibe. With loud music and shared bench-style tables, it's not the spot for a quiet conversation, but the authentic experience, friendly service, and fair prices make it worth a visit. The kitchen is fully in view, adding to the bustling ambiance. Customers recommend sharing starters due to the large portion sizes.
name: Los Pasajeros
address: C/ de Vicent Soler, 6, piso 1, 07800 Ibiza, Balearic Islands, Spain

detail_description: La Torreta Ibiza is a popular restaurant located in the heart of Dalt Vila, the Old Town. It is highly regarded by locals and visitors alike for its delicious food, charming atmosphere, and excellent service. The restaurant offers a culinary journey that excites the palate with some of the best flavors on the island. Situated on a charming cobbled street with great views, La Torreta's dishes are not only delicious but also beautifully presented.
name: La Torreta Ibiza
address: Plaça de Vila, 10, 07800 Ibiza, Balearic Islands, Spain

excerpt: Tucked-away restaurant with a charming courtyard, for high-end island cuisine with a modern twist.
detail_description: Es Ventall is a long-standing restaurant in San Antonio, Ibiza, known for its high-end island cuisine with a modern twist. The restaurant has been recognized as the best on the island by the Gastronomy Academy of Ibiza and Formentera. With over 35 years of experience, it has reinvented traditional recipes while using fresh produce from its own family vegetable garden. Dishes like Bullit de Peix and Sofrit Pages showcase their creative approach to Ibizan cuisine.
name: Es Ventall
address: Carrer de Cervantes, 22, 07820 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Illes Balears, Spain

excerpt: Refined Mediterranean meat & seafood dishes with sea views, plus sunbeds, cocktails & live DJs.
detail_description: Experimental Beach Ibiza, located at Las Salinas, offers a sophisticated yet relaxed atmosphere with stunning sea views. The beach club boasts a diverse cocktail list and a menu featuring Mediterranean meat and seafood dishes. Situated among the salt flats of Las Salinas, it is known for its cosmopolitan sunset bar experience. Visitors can reserve sun loungers and enjoy jumping off the jetty as the sun sets. Additionally, Experimental Beach provides an ideal setting for chic oceanside weddings with up to 250 guests.
name: Experimental Beach Ibiza
address: Camino Cap des Falco, 4856, 07818 Ibiza, Illes Balears, Spain

detail_description: Cova Santa is a unique venue located in Ibiza, built around a 1000-year-old cave and transformed into a fabulous internationally-influenced restaurant and event space. It hosts exclusive events including the popular WooMooN party featuring live bands, immersive experiences, and up-and-coming DJs under the stars.
name: Cova Santa
address: Ctra. San José, km 7 (desvío Sa Caleta), 07817 Ibiza, Spain

excerpt: Airy, modern setting with a hip, relaxed vibe, making tapas, plus cocktails & sangria.
detail_description: La Cava is a trendy and popular restaurant located in the bustling Vara de Rey square in Ibiza Town. It is part of the renowned Mambo Group and offers a modern, airy setting with a relaxed vibe. The restaurant features an inviting terrace perfect for people-watching while enjoying a variety of tapas, cocktails, sangria, and other delicious offerings.
name: La Cava
address: Passeig de Vara de Rey, 4, 07800 Ibiza, Balearic Islands, Spain

detail_description: Restaurant Camí de Balàfia is a charming family-run establishment that has been a part of Ibiza's dining scene for over 30 years. Despite its simplicity, it has gained a reputation for offering delicious food at reasonable prices. Located in St. Lorenzo near an orange tree plantation, the restaurant is run by the Mari family, who grill delicious food in an authentic wood oven while serving their customers with warmth and hospitality.
name: Restaurant Camí de Balàfia
address: Lugar, Carrer Venda de Balafia de Dalt, 25, 07812 Sant Joan de Labritja, Illes Balears, Spain

name: Finca La Plaza
address: Plaza de la Iglesia, 5, 07814 Santa Gertrudis de Fruitera, Balearic Islands, Spain

detail_description: Macao Café Sta Gertrudis is a popular Italian restaurant in the charming town of Santa Gertrudis. Managed by Luca, it offers a diverse menu featuring Italian-inspired dishes such as antipasto, pasta, and pizza. The restaurant provides a family-friendly atmosphere with a supervised creche area at night. Its picturesque garden and tree-shaded terrace make it an ideal spot for enjoying delicious food in the summer months.
name: Macao Café Sta Gertrudis
address: Carrer de la Vénda des Poble, 8, 07814 Santa Gertrudis de Fruitera, Balearic Islands, Spain

excerpt: Chill Japanese restaurant with counter seating offering sushi, sashimi & other seafood dishes.
detail_description: Sushiya Aoyama is a charming Japanese restaurant located in the heart of Ibiza Town, offering a relaxed atmosphere and counter seating for an authentic dining experience. Known for its top-notch sushi and sashimi made with fresh seafood sourced directly from the docks, this spot is a favorite among locals and visitors alike. The owners, Hideki and Helena, are experts in crafting fluffy sushi rice and creating unique dishes that showcase their meticulous attention to detail.
name: Sushiya Aoyama
address: Carrer de l'Arquebisbe Cardona Riera, 4, 07800 Ibiza, Balearic Islands, Spain

detail_description: Nestled in the picturesque Cala Moli, El Silencio Ibiza is a unique blend of gastronomy, art, and music that captivates all who visit. This enchanting venue has evolved over the years and now features renowned chef Mauro Colagreco, who emphasizes biodiversity and environmental care in his culinary creations. Guests can indulge in a delightful lunch menu showcasing top-quality ingredients like grilled spider crab and Iberian pork pluma.
name: El Silencio Ibiza
address: Av. de Cala Molí, 30, 07830 Sant Josep de sa Talaia, Illes Balears, Spain

detail_description: Chiringay Beach is a secluded, clothing-optional beach located at the southern tip of Ibiza. To reach this gay-friendly paradise, visitors can take a 20-minute walk through a rustic pine forest after parking their car. The beach offers warm shallow waters, a breezy restaurant with Mediterranean/Spanish cuisine and cava sangria, umbrella-topped beach chairs, and a relaxed atmosphere perfect for socializing and sunbathing.
name: Chiringay
address: Playa des Cavallet, 07818, Balearic Islands, Spain

detail_description: Restaurante Salvadó Pou des Lleó is a fantastic Mediterranean eatery offering an exceptional catch of the day at an affordable cost (approximately $18). It's unfortunate that they do not serve espresso, but their food is truly exquisite and highly recommended. This restaurant provides a remarkable dining experience with delicious cuisine.
name: Restaurante Salvadó Pou des Lleó
address: Platja de Carrer Pou des Lleó, s/n, 07850 Sant Carles de Peralta, Balearic Islands, Spain

excerpt: Refined meat & seafood paired with cocktails at a sleek venue opening onto a port-view terrace.
detail_description: Calma is a sleek restaurant located in the heart of Ibiza Town, offering refined meat and seafood dishes paired with cocktails. The venue opens onto a terrace with stunning views of Dalt Vila and the port of Ibiza. Guests can enjoy superb rice or fish dishes while taking in the beautiful scenery. Additionally, the restaurant features a heated landscaped terrace at La Brasa, providing a classic dining experience with a menu filled with Mediterranean cuisine.
name: Calma
address: Puerto Deportivo Ibiza Nueva, Paseo Juan Carlos I, s/n, 07800 Ibiza, Balearic Islands, Spain

detail_description: Sa Vida is a trendy restaurant located in the Santa Catalina neighborhood, offering a wide variety of wines and tapas. The menu includes several vegetarian options, and the friendly staff are willing to accommodate special requests. Guests have praised the fantastic falafel dish and the overall modern Spanish cuisine. The presentation of the food is delightful, and the service is exceptional. Visitors have described their experience as unparalleled, emphasizing the delicious food, wonderful wine selection, and welcoming atmosphere.
name: Sa Vida
address: C/ del Bisbe Carrasco, 14, 07800 Ibiza, Balearic Islands, Spain
